titles.title: A resolution recognizing National Nurses Week on May 6 through May 12, 2007.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

reference.label: text of measure as introduced in Senate

action.text: Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 5/14/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the contributions of nurses to the U.S. health care system. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Nurses Week.
